db.juhaku.juhakudb.filter

Class PredicateBuilder.JunctionBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • db.juhaku.juhakudb.filter.PredicateBuilder
      • db.juhaku.juhakudb.filter.PredicateBuilder.JunctionBuilder
  • Enclosing class:
    PredicateBuilder

    public static class PredicateBuilder.JunctionBuilder
extends PredicateBuilder
    Junction builder provides isolated operator clause for WHERE clause. These can be e.g. (A and B and C...) or (A or B or C...).

    This is handy for grouping some parts of criteria with parentheses.

    Junction cannot contain another junction instead it is to be added to root predicate builder.

    Since:
    2.0.2-SNAPSHOT

    • Method Detail

      • conjunction

        public PredicateBuilder.JunctionBuilder conjunction()
        Description copied from class: PredicateBuilder
        Creates new conjunction for current WHERE clause. Conjunction stands for grouped statement which is isolated with parentheses. E.g. (a AND b AND c...). This statement can contain only AND operators. Conjunction cannot contain another junction instead all junctions is to be added to root predicate builder for root WHERE clause.
        Overrides:
        conjunction in class PredicateBuilder
        Returns:
        New junction builder for current WHERE clause to create isolated criteria for query.

      • disjunction

        public PredicateBuilder.JunctionBuilder disjunction()
        Description copied from class: PredicateBuilder
        Creates new disjunction for current WHERE clause. Disjunction stands for grouped statement which is isolated with parentheses. E.g. (a OR b OR c...). This statement can contain only OR operators. Disjunction cannot contain another junction instead all junctions is to be added to root predicate builder for root WHERE clause.
        Overrides:
        disjunction in class PredicateBuilder
        Returns:
        New junction builder for current WHERE clause to create isolated criteria for query.
